full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Service Contract for MiSeq and NextSeq Instruments

#### Solicitation Number
01B46-23-211

#### Publication Date
January 16, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date
January 31, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

#### Expected Contract Start Date
March 1, 2024

#### Expected Contract End Date
February 28, 2025

### Service Contract Overview
The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a contractor to provide maintenance and repair services for one (1) MiSeq and one (1) NextSeq 550 Next-Generation Sequencer at the Guelph Research and Development Centre (RDC).

### Instrumentation Requirements
- MiSeq Illumina Next-Generation Sequencer
- NextSeq 550 Illumina Next-Generation Sequencer

### Service Contract Objectives
- Provide regular maintenance and repair services to ensure the optimal functionality of the instruments
- Limit downtime due to malfunctions
- Conduct a System Health Check to recertify the instruments prior to activation of the service contract

### Service Contract Description
The selected contractor will be responsible for providing maintenance and repair services for the specified instruments, including regular maintenance, troubleshooting, and repair of malfunctions. The contractor must also conduct a System Health Check to recertify the instruments prior to the activation of the service contract. This service contract is essential for the AAFC to maintain the functionality of the instruments and meet the deliverables of ongoing projects.

### Contracting Entity Information
- Contracting Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
- Contracting Entity Address: 93 Stone Road West, Guelph, ON N1G 5C9, Canada

### Contact Information
- Contact Name: Nicole LeBlanc
- Contact Email: [Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca](mailto:Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca)
- Contact Phone: 506378-2956

### Additional Information
- Tender Description and Documents: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29516/acan-%28e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29516/acan-%28e.pdf)

Please note that the tender is closed on January 31, 2024.  We will not be accepting any new proposals after this date.  The AAFC thanks all
